ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: i haven t tested the attack speed slowdown, but i have tested snare.  i guess rangers now have an 11 minute (!!!) snare.  though the snare icon stays up, after
ygData.messageBody:
i haven't tested the attack speed slowdown, but i have tested snare. i
guess rangers now have an 11 minute (!!!) snare. though the snare icon
stays up, after absonant binding wears off the snare is cancelled.

Shada Powa, L51 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> The AGI/AC debuff is pretty significant, as well. Between
> the 45 AGI debuff
> and the AC debuff, I dropped my AC by 62 points when I
> managed to stick this
> on myself. My only concern in using this would be if the attack speed
> component overwrote that of a shammie or enchanter (assuming
> they cast their
> spell first). Has anyone had a chance to test this yet? (I
> imagine no
> one -- including myself -- is in too much of a "testing"
> mentality right
> now, with so much new territory to explore, heh.)
>
> Raiel
